description: We are a leading force in the Influencer Marketing space, connecting top brands with an extensive network of over 3 million social media influencers. Trusted by over 60% of the Fortune 500, we're excited to expand our team with individuals who are eager to shape the future of how companies engage with customers through platforms like TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and more. Our team is composed of talented individuals from across the country who have already made significant strides in social media, influencer marketing, and various sectors of technology. We're thrilled to have you join us!
responsibilities: Oversee the overall success of our social campaigns, develop and execute creator strategies tailored to each campaign, refine current success metrics and introduce new ones, train the team on planning, audience reporting, research tools, writing, and presentation skills, liaise between the campaign management team and other key internal groups to ensure client needs are met, manage influencer 'casting', negotiation, contracting, and content management across different brand campaigns, demonstrate a strong understanding of the relationship between brand, media, and consumer in both offline and online spaces.

qualifications.required: Proven experience (5+ years) in digital, advertising, or influencer marketing, experience managing projects in a fast-paced/startup environment, established network of managers/agents or influencer contacts, strong negotiating skills and management of individual campaign influencer budgets, in-depth knowledge of all major social platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, TikTok, Twitter, YouTube), deep understanding of offline and online spaces, as well as online performance tracking and brand measurement tools, excellent organizational skills with the ability to multitask, attention to detail, and maintenance of records and materials, self-starter who loves collaboration, is open to feedback, and comfortable working independently or influencing cross-functional teams, Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience
qualifications.preferred: Experience with on-site or experiential influencer events, experience managing production elements of an influencer campaign, experience at a marketing-tech or media startup, passion for social media and/or influencer marketing.

benefits: Remote work, competitive compensation package, flexible time off with inclusive holiday benefits, comprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance for employees, fully vested 401(k) matching, a collaborative and diverse work culture.
